feedback.caption: Feedback form
feedback.headText: Bellow you can fill the form to give us some information about what we can improve

validation.emptyValue: Please enter a valid email address for shipping updates.

captcha.label: Enter the code that you see

validation.emptyOrIncorrect: Enter the coorect code. Click on image if you can't recognize it

validation.emptyValue: You should describe your error or suggestion

validation.maxFiles: There is allowed at most 5 files
validation.maxTotalFileSizeMb: The total files size more than 5 Mb

errors.404: Service is unavailable. There are some technical activities. Try again a little bit later.
errors.500: There are some problems concerning Feedback service. It might have been caused by technical activities.

success.0: Your request was sent to service desk. Thanks for your involvement!
success.1: Your suggestion was successfully sent. Thanks for your involvement!
